- A voice-activated, handheld calculator that uses artificial intelligence to help users solve-related problems, such as finding the nearest ATM or the-to-dollar conversion rate.

Calculator - A mobile app that uses augmented reality to turn any flat surface into a calculator. Simply point your phone at the surface, and the app will display a virtual calculator that you can use to perform calculations.
Calculatorize - A service that turns any physical object into a calculator. Simply send the object to the company, and they will add calculator functionality to it.
